issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Create a REPL & Dockerfile for DataFusion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4467](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4467). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a user, I would like to be able to simply `docker pull apache/arrow-datafusion` and run interactive and batch queries against my data sources.

This will require `CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE` to be implemented. I suggest referring to Apache Hive for syntax.

With this feature, it will be possible for users to start using DataFusion for some simple real world ETL use cases.
